articles.title: Report -- San Diego Padres, Joe Musgrove closing on 5-year, $100 million deal
articles.description: Joe Musgrove, coming off his first All-Star Game appearance, is closing on a five-year deal worth $100 million with his hometown San Diego Padres, according to the New York Post.

articles.title: Seattle Mariners finalizing deal with Cincinnati Reds for Luis Castillo, sources say
articles.description: The Mariners are finalizing a deal for star pitcher Luis Castillo of the Reds, sources told ESPN's Jeff Passan on Friday night.
articles.content:

articles.title: New York Yankees' Aaron Judge becomes first player to 40 home runs
articles.description: Aaron Judge became the first player in the majors with 40 home runs this season with a two-run drive for the New York Yankees against the Kansas City Royals on Friday night.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Aaron Judge became the first player in the majors with 40 home runs this season with a two-run drive for the New York Yankees against the Kansas City Royals on Friday night.

articles.title: Pac-12 commissioner George Kliavkoff bullish on expanded College Football Playoff, potentially before 2025
articles.description: Pac-12 commissioner George Kliavkoff said he is "really confident" that the College Football Playoffs will be expanded and could see it happening potentially before the current contracts end following the 2025 season.

articles.title: Jacksonville Jaguars sign K Elliott Fry, cut Andrew Mevis
articles.description: The Jaguars have signed kicker Elliott Fry and cut rookie Andrew Mevis, who hit former Cowboys head coach Dave Campo with a badly missed field goal attempt during training camp.
